entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as wishing he were back at Hogwarts this year. He says he might even get time off to come and watch a bit of it.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is impatiently asking Bill why he wishes he were back at Hogwarts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being irritated by his mother's hint that they know something about their upcoming year at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is thanking Mrs. Weasley for having them stay.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is also thanking Mrs. Weasley for having them stay.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as inviting the trio to stay with her and hinting that they know something about their upcoming year at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Bill wishes he were back at Hogwarts this year.
